items.summary: Save the uploaded Kingston Customizations logo image (IMG_2219.jpeg â€” cream background with dark brown crown and script lettering) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.png and use it as the hero logo image in the Hero component. The image must be loaded directly from this static path (not fetched from the backend) so it appears instantly on page load with no flash, placeholder, or other image showing first. All other content and layout in the Hero component must remain unchanged.
